name: SKStoreReviewController
desc: An object that controls the process of requesting App Store ratings and reviews from users.

items.name: class func requestReview(in: UIWindowScene)
items.desc: Tells StoreKit to ask the user to rate or review the app, if appropriate, using the specified scene.

items.name: class func requestReview()
items.desc: Tells StoreKit to ask the user to rate or review your app, if appropriate.
